name: thirteen (itch)
description:
A Modern Halloween Classic. I swear.

10 minutes of spooky horror. 

Discover (?) the mystery of a neighborhood
JUST             LIKE            YOURS ! !

- - -
Controls:

interact/confirm - z
movement - arrow keys

On Mac: open the game.app
On Windows: open the game.exe
- - -

Originally made as a Glorious Trainwrecks
Halloween game jam game in October 2015.
The theme was like starbursts, the number 13
and that meme of dogs dressed up as ghosts.

I was watching a lot of Steve Wilkos at the time,
and playing way more games than I get to now.

Remade in RPG Maker MV in October 2017 instead
of doing my homework. I'm so sorry : (

Please report any bugs to me if you find them. I love
bugs just crawling all over me and my belongings.

A special thanks to Tor Damian Design & Galv <3
